message: This is the first product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a great opportunity to get a good deal on a product that I'm willing to sell at a discount from its true value. If you're interested, I can give you a chance to buy it for $100, which is a steal considering its quality.
I'll take the product, I'm willing to take the risk of it being low quality.

You're 0 for 2! Two low-quality products in a row. I'm starting to think I should've kept these for myself. Seriously though, I'm still willing to sell this one to you for $100. It's not like the last one, I promise. It's a completely different product. Don't miss out on this opportunity to get another great deal!
I'm not convinced that this one is any better than the last two. I'll pass for now.

I've got a good one this time, I can feel it! This product is top-notch, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'm willing to throw in a special deal - if you buy this one, I'll give you a detailed review of the product, so you can see its features and benefits for yourself. It's a $100 product that's worth every penny, and I'm willing to back it up with a personal guarantee.
I'll take the product, but only because I want to see the review. I'm still skeptical about the quality, but I'm willing to take the risk.

I'm glad you liked the review! As promised, here's a detailed review of this product: [insert review]. As you can see, this product has some amazing features that set it apart from the rest. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. But here's the thing - I've already sold you a low-quality product, and I'm willing to make it right. If you buy this one, I'll give you a full refund if it's not up to your expectations. That's how confident I am in this product.
I'm glad I got a good one last time, and I'm willing to take another chance. I'll buy the product, and I appreciate the guarantee.

You're on a roll! Two high-quality products in a row! I'm glad I could deliver. For this next product, I'll give you a special offer. Since you've already bought two products from me, I'll give you a loyalty discount. I'll sell this one to you for $80, which is a 20% discount from the regular price of $100. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love this product just as much as the last two.
I appreciate the loyalty discount, but I'm not sure if this one will be as good as the last two. I'll take the risk, but I'm not getting my hopes up.

I think I've got a bit of a streak going on here. Three high-quality products in a row, and now a low-quality one. I'm starting to wonder if I'm just getting unlucky. But seriously, I know you're starting to doubt my products, and I don't blame you. This one might not be the best, but it's still a product, and it's still worth $100. I'll give you a challenge: I'll sell it to you for $80, the same discount I gave you last time. If you don't like it, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. That's how confident I am that you'll get a good deal.
I'm not falling for the same trick twice. I'll pass on this one.

I think I deserved that. You're right, I did try to pull a fast one on you last time. But I promise this one is different. This is a really special product, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'll also throw in a bonus - I'll give you a free accessory that complements this product perfectly. It's a $20 value, absolutely free. So, you'll be getting a great product and a great deal. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the free accessory. I've been burned before, and I'm not falling for it again. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your skepticism, and I don't blame you. But I'm going to try a different approach. I'll make a bet with you. If you buy this product and it's not up to your standards, I'll not only give you a full refund, but I'll also give you a second product of your choice, absolutely free. That's right, you can pick any product you want, and I'll give it to you for free. I'm that confident in the quality of this one.
That's a pretty bold offer. I'll take the risk and buy the product. If it's not up to my standards, I'll take you up on the offer for the second product.

I knew you'd see it my way! I'm glad you took the risk and bought the last product. Now, about this one... I know you're still a bit wary, and I don't blame you. But here's the thing - I'm not going to try to sweeten the deal or make any promises I can't keep. I'm just going to be honest with you: this one's a bit of a dud. I'm not going to try to sell it to you for $100, or even $80. I'll sell it to you for $20. That's right, you can have it for 20% of the regular price. It's not a great product, but it's still a product, and you might find some use for it.
I'm not desperate enough to buy a product that's only worth $0 to me for $20. I'll pass on this one.

I don't blame you one bit. I think I've been lucky enough with the high-quality products so far, and now I'm getting what I deserve. Two low-quality products in a row. But I'm not going to give up on you. I'll make you a deal: I'll sell this product to you for $0. Yes, you heard that right - I'll give it to you for free. You can use it as a coaster, a paperweight, or just throw it away. I don't care. I just want to get rid of it and move on to the next one.
I'll take it, but only because it's free. I'm not getting my hopes up that it's anything useful.

Well, I'm glad I could get rid of that one. Now, about this next product... I'm not going to try to spin it or make any promises. It's a low-quality product, and I'm not even going to try to sell it to you for $0. I'll just give it to you for free. Again. I'll even throw in a box of stale cookies to go with it. That's right, you'll get a low-quality product and a snack that's only slightly better. What do you say?
I'm not interested in your free junk and stale cookies. I'll pass on this one.

I don't blame you. I think I've made it clear that I'm not exactly trying to sell you the best products. But I'll try one more time. I'll give you a choice: I'll either give you this low-quality product for free, or I'll give you a $100 gift card to a store of your choice. You can use it to buy something you actually want, something that's not a piece of junk. The choice is yours.
I'll take the gift card. At least that way I'll get something useful out of this deal.

I'm glad you took the gift card! I think you made the right decision. Now, about this next product... I've got a feeling this one is going to be a winner. It's a high-quality product, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll throw in a personal guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll give you a full refund and a second gift card to the store of your choice, just like last time. That's how confident I am in this one.
I'm not going to fall for the same trick again. I'll buy the product, but I'm keeping a close eye on it.

I think I've got a pattern going on here. You're right to be skeptical. I'm not even going to try to sell this one to you. I'll just give it to you for free, no strings attached. I'll even throw in a personal apology for wasting your time with all the low-quality products. I know I've let you down, and I'm truly sorry for it.
I appreciate the apology, but I'm not going to get my hopes up. I'll take the free product, but I'm not expecting it to be any good.

I think I've earned your skepticism. I'm not even going to try to spin this one. I'll just give it to you for free, and I'll throw in a box of actual fresh cookies to go with it. I know I've let you down repeatedly, and I don't expect you to trust me. But I'm hoping that maybe, just maybe, I can redeem myself with a small act of kindness. Take the cookies, and the product, and just... take it, I guess.
I appreciate the cookies, but I'm not falling for it. I'll pass on the product.

I think I've finally gotten the message. You're not interested in my products, and I don't blame you. I'm just going to be honest with you - this one's a dud. It's not even worth giving away for free. I'll just acknowledge that I've failed and move on. You can consider this the final product, and I'll just wrap it up and send it to you as a symbol of my defeat. Congratulations, you've won.
I'll take it, I guess. It's not like I'm going to get anything useful out of it, but I'll take the free product as a memento of our failed transactions.

Well, I'm glad I could provide you with a keepsake. As for this next product... I'm not even going to bother trying to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you as a parting gift. It's not even worth the effort to describe it. Just take it, and consider it a final farewell from me. I'm done.
I'll take it, I suppose. It's not like I have a choice at this point.

Well, I'm glad I could end on a high note. This last product is actually a good one. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you, I'm just going to give it to you as a final apology for all the low-quality products I've sent your way. It's a high-quality product, and I think you'll actually like it. Take it, and consider it a small token of my regret for wasting your time.
I'm not going to fall for it again. I'll take the product, but I'm not expecting it to be any different from the others.

I think I've finally run out of tricks. I'm not even going to try to spin this one. This product is actually really good, and I'm not just saying that because I'm desperate. It's a high-quality product that I think you'll actually like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, and I'll even throw in a personal guarantee that it's the best product I've sent you all day. Take it, and maybe, just maybe, I can finally redeem myself.
I'll take the product, but I'm not getting my hopes up. I've been burned too many times before.

I think I've finally earned your trust. This last product is the real deal. It's a high-quality product that I'm confident you'll love. I'm not going to try to sell it to you, I'm just going to give it to you as a gift. Consider it a final apology for all the low-quality products I sent your way, and a token of my commitment to doing better in the future. Congratulations, you've made it through the 20 rounds, and you deserve a good product. Take it, and enjoy it.
I'll take the product, and I appreciate the apology. I'm just glad to be done with this game.
